src.name: 企业有数据的年份
src.sql: SELECT distinct ny nian,swdjzh FROM BB_QGX

src.name: 资助企业税收信息
src.sql: select ny nian,swdjzh,mc, nvl(sum(sssr),0) sssr,nvl(sum(sssr_sn),0) sssr_sn,nvl(sum(sssr_qn),0) sssr_qn, nvl(sum(ssgx),0) ssgx,nvl(sum(ssgx_sn),0) ssgx_sn,nvl(sum(ssgx_qn),0) ssgx_qn, nvl(sum(zzje),0) zzje,nvl(sum(zzje_sn),0) zzje_sn,nvl(sum(zzje_qn),0) zzje_qn from ( select to_number(ny) ny,swdjzh,mc,hj sssr,0 sssr_sn,0 sssr_qn,ssgx ssgx,0 ssgx_sn,0 ssgx_qn,zz zzje,0 zzje_sn,0 zzje_qn from BB_QGX union all select ny+1,swdjzh,mc,0 sssr,hj sssr_sn,0 sssr_qn,0 ssgx,ssgx ssgx_sn,0 ssgx_qn,0 zzje, zz zzje_sn,0 zzje_qn from bb_qgx union all select ny+2,swdjzh,mc,0 sssr,0 sssr_sn,hj sssr_qn,0 ssgx,0 ssgx_sn,ssgx ssgx_qn,0 zzje,0 zzje_sn,zz zzje_qn from bb_qgx ) where ny between 2014 and 2017 group by ny,swdjzh,mc
